name: Cufant
description: The Copperderm Pokémon. It digs up the ground with its trunk. It’s also very strong, being able to carry loads of over five tons without any problem at all.

abilities.name: Sheer Force
abilities.description: When activating a move that has a chance to impose a stat change or inflict a status, this creature instead doubles its move modifier for the damage with no chance of the additional effect.

abilities.name: Heavy Metal
abilities.description: This Pokémon is especially heavy. Once per long rest, after being targeted by an attack, it may increase its AC by 2 if it would cause an attack to miss.
